pages.text: On the day when every soul shall find itself presented with what it has done of good and what it has done of evil, then it will long that there were between itself and that evil a wide distance. Allah bids you beware of Himself, but Allah is gentle with H
Say, "If you love Allah then follow me, and Allah will love you and forgive you your sins, for Allah is Forgiving and Merciful
Say, "Obey Allah and the Messenger"; but if they turn away Allah loves not disbelievers
Verily, Allah has preferred Adam, and Noah, and Abraham´s family, and Imran´s family above all people
Offsprings one of the other. Allah Hears and Knows all things
